=BZNetwork=
BZNetwork is a web administration interface for a bzflag server network. It allows groups to be created. These groups act as independent networks for all purposes concerned except for the fact that they are on the same host. 

=Authentication=
Authentication should be pluggable. Authentication providers are installed by adding an entry to WEB-INF/config/auth.txt. The file contains lines that look like name,url,description. The url specified should generally be at the server
